title: FS: Cobb, Young, Broad Leaf 460, Drum, Uzit, Carolina Brights, Hindu & much more ...
author: DerekMichael

posts.post_title: FS: Cobb, Young, Broad Leaf 460, Drum, Uzit, Carolina Brights, Hindu & much more ...
posts.post_content:
We currently have a lovely assortment of exotic T206 cards available including Hall of Famers Ty Cobb, Cy Young and Zack Wheat, extremely rare backs such as Broad Leaf 460, Drum, Uzit, Carolina Brights, Piedmont factory 42, as well as Hindu and American Beauty, and great rarities including a drastic miscut and a genuine proof card.

For front and back scans and pricing please contact us at: t206society@gmail.com. Inquiries will be responded to in the order in which they were received and all pieces will be made available on a first come, first served basis.

Thank you very much for your interest.

Derek

Drum is no longer available. All others remain.
